lead_paragraph: FOLEY--Rita. The Women's Forum of New York mourns the passing of our member Rita Foley, Corporate Director, retired Fortune 500 Global President, author and photographer. Rita was a committed leader in numerous organizations dedicated to improving the health and lives of individuals. She had an impact on all who knew her. Carolyn Carter, President Rita B. Crotty, Executive Director 1/3
